author: Gabby Orr and Steve Contorno, CNN
title: CPAC speakers seek to set themselves apart as they condemn Putin
description: Despite its Trump-loving crowd, the annual Conservative Political Action Conference became a venue this week for top Republicans to set themselves apart from each other and, in some cases, from the former President as they sharply condemned Russian President …
